data.name: Shuravas, the Enraged
data.notes: "Shuravas, the Enraged" appears during thunderstorms to fly through the canyon north of Qing Long Glade in central Noctilum. Breaking the fin is the only way to recieve the "Signature Glaive: Allegiance" drop however breaking the fin also causes it to enrage making the remainder of the fight more difficult.
